PropertyList.name: Approach
PropertyList.description:
The aircraft will be on "approach" to specified runway, flaps set, engines running. First select "Location" tab with "Runway" and "On final approach", then select this state.
Start state with --state=Approach
Additional parameters required Use Runway, On final approch in QT-launcher GUI Or supply --lon=degrees Starting longitude (west = -) --lat=degrees Starting latitude (south = -) --altitude=value Starting altitude (in feet unless --units-meters specified) --heading=degrees Specify heading (yaw) angle (Psi) --vc=knots Specify initial airspeed
